item.title: v1.0.0
item.description: First release : - Link a Google Spreadsheet - Update an existing text with a random ipsum - Create a text box with a random ipsum

item.title: v1.1.0 - Google API migration
item.description:
What's changed: - API Workflow has changed because Google has stopped to support the V3 API (thanks to @benborgers for his fantastic API [opensheet](https://github.com/benborgers/opensheet)) - The sheet name is required to make the plugin operate
Minor changes: - Bump acorn from 6.3.0 to 6.4.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/a-ng-d/sketch-awesome-ipsums/pull/1 - Bump elliptic from 6.5.1 to 6.5.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/a-ng-d/sketch-awesome-ipsums/pull/3 - Bump lodash from 4.17.15 to 4.17.19 by @dependabot in https://github.com/a-ng-d/sketch-awesome-ipsums/pull/2 - Bump path-parse from 1.0.6 to 1.0.7 by @dependabot in https://github.com/a-ng-d/sketch-awesome-ipsums/pull/10 - Bump browserslist from 4.7.0 to 4.16.6 by @dependabot in https://github.com/a-ng-d/sketch-awesome-ipsums/pull/9 - Bump lodash from 4.17.19 to 4.17.21 by @dependabot in https://github.com/a-ng-d/sketch-awesome-ipsums/pull/8 - Bump yargs-parser from 13.1.1 to 13.1.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/a-ng-d/sketch-awesome-ipsums/pull/4 - Bump elliptic from 6.5.3 to 6.5.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/a-ng-d/sketch-awesome-ipsums/pull/5 - Bump y18n from 4.0.0 to 4.0.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/a-ng-d/sketch-awesome-ipsums/pull/6 - Bump ssri from 6.0.1 to 6.0.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/a-ng-d/sketch-awesome-ipsums/pull/7
